w16cs350.datatype

Class CoordinatesDelta

  • java.lang.Object
    • w16cs350.datatype.CoordinatesDelta

  • public class CoordinatesDelta
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines coordinates in an arbitrary coordinate system with arbitrary units.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoordinatesDelta(double x, double y)
      Creates delta coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoordinatesDelta add(CoordinatesDelta coordinates)
      Adds delta coordinates to this one and returns a new one with the sum.
      Angle calculateBearing(CoordinatesDelta target)
      Calculates the angle from these coordinates to another.
      double calculateDistance(CoordinatesDelta target)
      Calculates the distance from these coordinates to another.
      CoordinatesDelta calculateTarget(Angle bearing, double distance)
      Calculates the target coordinates that lie at a given distance and angle from these coordinates.
      double getX()
      Gets the x coordinate.
      double getY()
      Gets the y coordinate.
      CoordinatesDelta subtract(CoordinatesDelta coordinates)
      Subtracts delta coordinates from this one and returns a new one with the difference.
      java.lang.String toString()
